io.codecastle.scriptorium.json.scribe

Class JsonEscaper

  • Object
    • JsonEscaper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Escaper

    public class JsonEscaper
extends Object
implements Escaper
    An Escaper that escapes characters to be included in JSON string literals, including both values and keys.

    This escaper minimally conforms to section 7 of IETF RFC-8259 and may not be appropriate for all use-cases and security contexts. Importantly, not all legal JSON strings are legal JavaScript strings, as JavaScript requires some characters be escaped that JSON does not.

    This implementation chooses the shorter (fewer characters) escape sequence for the supplied character when multiple valid escape sequences are allowed.
